DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate safety efficacy bilateral DWT subject POAG OHT compare active sham control . The secondary purpose study investigate durability , repeatability , response .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Deep Wave Trabeculoplasty ( DWT ) Primary Open Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Male female subject , 18 year old . Subjects diagnose either POAG OHT eye . The diagnosis POAG must include evidence : 1 . Optic disc retinal nerve fiber layer structural abnormality ( substantiate OCT ) ; and/or 2 . Visual field abnormality ( substantiate Humphrey automate perimeter use SITA Standard 242 test algorithm . Mean deviation ( MD ) score must 15dB < MD < 0dB . Subjects 9:00AM ( +/ 1 hour ) median IOP eye : 1 . Greater equal 18mmHg Screening Visit document history IOP great equal 22mmHg ; 2 . Greater equal 22mmHg Eligibility Visits . Subjects currently use one topical medication control IOP . Subjects able willing comply protocol , include randomization assignment followup visit . Subjects sign inform consent form . Subjects pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant course study . Subjects form glaucoma primary openangle glaucoma ( e.g. , pseudo exfoliation pigmentary glaucoma ) . Other exclusion criterion apply
